original_title: Rendszerhiba - A magyar film el nem mondott története
overview: Thirty years, three eras: they have been trying to save the Hungarian film industry again and again over the decades. Among these attempts were highs, lows, countless deals and compromises. And now some say that we are living in the saddest period of Hungarian filmmaking.
title: Rendszerhiba - A magyar film el nem mondott története
